titleStmt.title: Quæstio in philosophia discutienda sub Carolo Chauncæo, S.S. Theol: Bac: præside Col: Harvard: Cantab: Nov-Angl: in comitiis, per inceptorem in artibus, decimo die sextilis M. DC. LVIII.
titleStmt.author: Harvard College (1636-1780)
Chauncy, Charles, 1592-1672.

notesStmt.note: Announcement of a debate at Harvard College.
Wing gives title as: "Quæstiones in philosophia".
Reproduction of the original in the Hunterian Museum Library, Glasgow University.
